HomePage.Colab en diseño e implementación de micr: Collab in design and implementation of microservices
HomePage.Encapsulación en Workspace - Shell, Modu: Encapsulation in Workspace - Shell, Module and Vite Federation, Share UI + Tokens
HomePage.Angular 21 - React 19, roles, guards/int: Angular 21 - React 19, roles, guards/interceptors and consumption of REST API JWT Tokens
HomePage.Centraliza tokens y una librería de UI C: Centralizes tokens and a UI Component library, used in React and Angular
HomePage.Estoy utilizando los mejores métodos de: I am applying leading design methods in my work

ProjectsInfo.autentificacionPDescription1: Dashboard/Admin in Angular 21 (Signals + zoneless with authentication (login) and role-based authorization, with security through guards/interceptors and consumption of REST API (DummyJSON).
ProjectsInfo.autentificacionPDescription2: Authentication system in React + TypeScript, with Zustand as global state, integrated with custom backend in NestJS and Firebase Authentication, featuring advanced session control, expiration, inactivity, and UX in dashboard.
ProjectsInfo.microfrontendPDescription1: Developed with Angular 21 as shell/remotes and a remote widget in React (Vite + Module Federation), sharing state (cart-state) and UI components (ui-kit) with TailwindCSS v.4.1 styles.
ProjectsInfo.microfrontendPDescription2: This project implements a 7 micro frontends architecture encapsulated in Workspace - Shell sharing UI Tokens - Design System
ProjectsInfo.designsystemPDescription1: Design System monorepo that centralizes design tokens and a React component library, with a documentation portal to validate and demonstrate its use.
